rows.title: Providing white space in a Swing GUI

138:
<p><a href="http://www.jgoodies.com/freeware/libraries/forms/" rel="noreferrer">JGoodies <strong>FormLayout</strong>.</a>  </p>

<p>Author Karsten Lentzsch has a collection of <a href="http://www.jgoodies.com/downloads/articles-and-presentations/" rel="noreferrer">presentations</a> on UI design.   In particular <a href="http://www.jgoodies.com/download/presentations/Swing%20with%20Style.pdf" rel="noreferrer">this PDF</a> speaks to the need for aesthetic whitespace.  Adding meaningful space while also paying attention to clutter separates the wheat from the chaff.</p>
